# Test Fixtures

This directory contains test data and sample files used for testing.

## Files

- `sample-pitch-deck.pdf` - Sample PDF pitch deck (to be added)
- `startup-data.csv` - Sample startup data in CSV format (to be added)
- `business-plan.pdf` - Sample business plan (to be added)
- `financials.xlsx` - Sample financial spreadsheet (to be added)
- `video.mp4` - Unsupported file type for error testing (to be added)

## Usage

These fixtures are used in:
- Unit tests (`tests/unit/`)
- E2E tests (`tests/e2e/`)
- Integration tests

## Adding New Fixtures

1. Add the file to this directory
2. Update this README with description
3. Reference it in your tests
4. Keep files small (<1MB) for fast test execution
